answers.answer: You need to tell your doc asap. Expecally if you have swelling in your hands and face. They will check your protein levels and blood pressure for preeclampsia. Preeclampsia is very serious and can develop over night. The only cure is to deliver the baby. I had it twice and had to deliver at 32 weeks and 30 weeks with my kids. Good luck. I hope you don't get it.

Thanks girl and i noticed when i had my last glucose test done that i had a head ache when i got the results that day. They told me that i probably had a headache bc my body was used to having a little caffeine. Every since i was 18 weeks ive had headaches then they tested me for pre eclampsia and they said it came bck negative. Im just kinda scared bc this is my first baby that i have carried for more than 14 weeks.  I go bck to the doctor on monday so ill talk to them then!!

Go back to doctor asap!!!They my friend her hole pregnancy she didn't have it.. she went in labor had a stroke due to her high blood pressure.She almost didn't make itThank god she made it....Make them test you again dont worry at least u caught it early

question: I am 28 weeks and 3 days pregnant.  I was tested for pre eclampsia not too long ago and my doctor ( i go to a high risk doctor) they told me it came back negative.  Well ive still been having frequent headaches,lots of swelling in my legs and feet,  and been having high blood pressure. What could that mean since i was already tested negative for pre eclampsia?
title: question for anyone how thinks they might know
